5A334C6A.Line1.7FA05: If you asked him, he’d say I abandoned the Horadrim’s ways.

8E1C3F6E.Line5.7FA05: The thing about Lorath… it’s hard for him to get close to people, and even harder to let them go.

F427C5EC.Line3.7FA05: But all I wanted was to broaden our horizons. Forge new allies with the Cathedral. Start a family of my own.

FD25A59B.VoiceDir5.7FA05: taking a breath, telling it as it is, no judgment
